AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: conservation volunteer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of an animal conservation project on a Midworld that objected to creating life via cloning. With no other legal means available to bring back extinct species, [PAWN_pronoun] volunteered to be transformed into a red wolf [PAWN_objective]self. The experiment was aborted before it could be completed, but [PAWN_pronoun] chose to retain the mutations [PAWN_pronoun] had gained.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: red wolf of wall street
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of the board for a financially successful yet environmentally disasterous megacorporation on [PAWN_possesive] homeworld. Radical ecoterrorists bombed the headquarters with mutagen-laced gas, turning many of the board members into the very animals their corporate policies once threatened. [PAWN_nameDef] escaped the worst of the gas, but they still found themselves partially transformed into an endangered species of wolf.
